OOC: Has anyone seen Shomin? I want to get my Vulois story on with.

Starscream/Gotron

Starscream got Phobia's messages.

"Yeah, no problem. I told Zardus all we know about Megatron, and he's 
willing to help. I'll try to see if I can get a battle ready."

Starscream turned to Gotron.

"Looks like battle time. You in?"

"Wouldn't miss it for the world, as the humans say."

Starscream sent a comm to Zardus.

"Zardus, it's Starscream. I hate to disturb you again but something 
big has just come up from my group. It is a neccesity that I meet 
with you. Please respond."
______________________________________________________________________
Prebon

Prebon shook his head.

"I only said one possibility. You could capture me here and force me 
to free Striker. No. I will be at the spot in 2 mega cycles. I will 
bring both prisoners. If you are not there, they will both die. Let's 
go."

They all turned back, Hammer and Ignatius dragging Spears back. 
Ignatius went to Beast Mode and put Spears on his back. He took off 
into the sky as Prebon and Hammer walked back to the base. Ignatius 
spoke to Spears.

"You better hope Ramulus shows, or Striker gets the chip."

______________________________________________________________________
Brix/Fliq

Brix and Fliq both got pissed.

"Damn it! You know, before we left for the moo, I shook hands with 
Striker and told him I'd see him again if I made it. He assured me I 
would. Now he's the one who isn't going to make it. I say we show up 
at the quadrant, but WE show up and toast that guy!"

"Easy Brix. You're letting Bronco get to you. It's Ramulus' decision. 
What are we going to do?"
